name: Diversify Research
text: Own 3 non-unit upgrade technologies, in at least 2 color, other than your starting technologies.

name: Bestow a Keleres Fleet
text: Remove 1 of your carriers, 1 of your curisers, and 1 of your destroyers from the game board.

name: Master the Sciences
text: Own 6 non-unit upgrade technologies other than your starting technologies, with at least one in each of the four colors.

name: Establish Imperial Navy
text: Remove 2 of your carriers, 2 of your cruisers, and 2 of your destroyers from the game board.
